title: Mini-Ep 211: 50 Shades of Gray
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 211: 50 Shades of Gray
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss their current skincare philosophies and hear from listeners about some skincare secrets and the shock of gray pubic hair, and get some advice from listeners on pooping at work. - To leave a voicemail or text for a future episo...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss their current skincare philosophies and hear from listeners about some skincare secrets and the shock of gray pubic hair, and get some advice from listeners on pooping at work.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
